title: FDA Review of Pfizer Covid-19 Vaccine in Children Under 5 Expected Soon
sub_head: A decision by the agency on whether to authorize the shot is likely to come this month
body:
U.S. health regulators are expected to release as soon as Friday their review of an application to expand access to the Covid-19 vaccine from Pfizer Inc. and BioNTech SE to children under 5 years old.
The children, including those as young as six months, are the last group of people waiting on access to shots.
